Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

SEURAT Document

Packages
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT This package contains code that sets up the SEURAT plugin.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.actions Most code that implements SEURAT actions is located in the monster class that sets up the Rationale Explorer view.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.api This package sets up a simplified API that we were experimenting with on another project.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.decorators This package handles decorator management for SEURAT.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.editors This package contains the editors for the different rationale entities.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.inference The inference package contains classes to check to see if changes made to a rationale element result in status changes.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries This package implements various rationale queries (find entity, find overrides, etc.) that are accessed via the pull-down menu on the RationaleExplorer.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData This package contains the definitions for all the rationale elements.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.reports This package implements rationale reports (traceability matrix, rationale tree) that are accessed via the pull-down menu on the RationaleExplorer or in the tree.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.tasks This package sets up the RationaleTask view.
edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.views This package sets up the RationaleExplorer and handles operations within it.
instrumentation This package contains some logging code that was used during the initial evaluation experiments but is currently turned off.
SEURAT.editors This package implements SEURAT's rationale editors using the Eclipse editor framework.
SEURAT.editors.unused This package contains new rationale editors that are currently not used in the system.
SEURAT.events This package contains the SEURAT publish-subscribe manager class and related classes which are used to dynamically update the Eclipse-style editors in real-time.
SEURAT.popup.actions The only class here is RemoveAssociationUsingBookmark.
SEURAT.preferences This package sets up the preference page for SEURAT.
SEURAT.search This package is the main package for the SEURAT integrated search functionality.
SEURAT.search.commonArguments This package contains the relevant classes for the Common Argument search type.
SEURAT.search.entities This package contains the relevant classes for the Entitiy search type.
SEURAT.search.importanceOverrides This package contains the relevant classes for the Importance Override search type.
SEURAT.search.requirements This package contains the relevant classes for the Requirements search type.
SEURAT.search.statusOverrides This package contains the relevant classes for the Status Override search type.
SEURAT.xmlIO This package contains a class to read in rationale from an XML file.
